content: Hey @Eric Huss, I am hoping we can move forward on https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2957. I have written some of my concerns. Do you have time to respond to them?
I will try to respond to them when I can. There are some bugs with the resolver that I am working on, and will get back to the RFC after they are resolved.

Thanks. With me finishing up things I wanted to do on rust-analyzer, I would like to take https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2887. But it also kinda ties into the resolver. So, I have been reading stuff around this. :smile:
